author: NoiselessVolatileLobster
name: AdvancedRoleRewards
short: Grant role rewards based on level and tenure.
description: This cog allows an administrator to grant role rewards based on level and tenure, including multistep, secret, and opt-in rewards.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores a start date for users to calculate tenure. This data is removed when the user leaves the server.
